channel.title: Wats wrong with this?

item.title: Wats wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Erm it fixed it so it dosen’t do it for some global objects.

It still says it for the highscores board and when I click “use bank” however.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2009, 07:51:47 am[/size][hr]New one :

Still dosen’t work

if (objectID == 2473 && objectX == 3096 && objectY == 3240 && donator == 1) {
				triggerTele(3116, 9844, 0);
} else {
				sM("You to be a donator to use this teleport. Type ::donate to find out more!");
			}

item.title: Wats wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

if (objectID == 2473 && (donator == 1) && (objectX == 3096) && (objectY == 3240) && donator=>1){ toX = 2285; toY = 3361; }else if (donator == 0) { sM("You need Donator status to enter this portal, type ::donate to find out more!"); }

That should do it

item.title: Wats wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

What’s wrong with this? It’s sending the “You need Donator status to enter this portal, type ::donate to find out more” message to every object once I click it.

			if (objectID == 2473 && (donator == 1) && (objectX == 3096) && (objectY == 3240)){
toX = 2285;
toY = 3361;
}else if (donator == 0) {
sM("You need Donator status to enter this portal, type ::donate to find out more!");
}

Read full topic
